testcase.name: chromium › Employee attendance module functionality › 137 verify an employee attendance edit is not functional in a date which employee didnt start working in company
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Dashboard with "english" language.......................passed Then click module button: "employee_attendance_btn".......................passed Then verify page Title "Employee Attendance" is visible...................passed When I click the id filter................................................passed Then If fill with id nummer "125".........................................passed Then I see first row has data like below:.................................passed Then click edit button in first row of employee attendance page...........passed Then verify "Mehmet" "test_attendance" is seen as page title..............passed Then I verify select month svg button is functional and I click it........passed When I click the chosen "July"............................................passed Then I see "July" becomes visible in select Box...........................passed Then I click year svg button..............................................passed When I click the "2024" in example........................................passed Then verify "2024" becomes visible in select Box..........................passed Then I verify warning "The employee is not actively working in the sele...passed
